info.title: SuperOffice Agent API v1
info.termsOfService: You must be an authorized user to access this API.

post.summary: Flushes all NetServer caches

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Optional comma separated list of properties to include in the result. Other fields are then nulled out to reduce payload size: "Name,department,category". Default = show all fields.

parameters.name: SO-AppToken
parameters.description: The application token that identifies the partner app. Used when calling Online WebAPI from a server.

post.summary: Get the name of the caches that can be flushed

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Optional comma separated list of properties to include in the result. Other fields are then nulled out to reduce payload size: "Name,department,category". Default = show all fields.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: Convert string references and multi-language values into a specified language (iso2) code.

parameters.name: SO-Language
parameters.description: Convert string references and multi-language values into a specified language (iso2) code. Overrides Accept-Language value.

parameters.name: SO-Culture
parameters.description: Number, date formatting in a specified culture (iso2 language) code. Partially overrides SO-Language/Accept-Language value. Ignored if no Language set.

parameters.name: SO-TimeZone
parameters.description: Specify the timezone code that you would like date/time responses converted to.

parameters.name: SO-AppToken
parameters.description: The application token that identifies the partner app. Used when calling Online WebAPI from a server.

post.summary: Log a change in view state.
post.description:
The granularity of the logging depends on the current configuration. This call returns asynchronously, leaving the server to finish processing later on.
NsApiSlow threshold: 2000 ms.

post.summary: Collect and transmit usage statistics: Database Additions.
post.description:
If opted-out then this call does nothing. The call returns immediately (starting a background thread), and updates CS scheduler table to set the next run time.
NsApiSlow threshold: 2000 ms.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Optional comma separated list of properties to include in the result. Other fields are then nulled out to reduce payload size: "Name,department,category". Default = show all fields.

parameters.name: SO-AppToken
parameters.description: The application token that identifies the partner app. Used when calling Online WebAPI from a server.

post.summary: After upgrading to a new fileset, there may be tasks that need to be done.
post.description:
Examples - import new TypicalSearches, if present. Tasks performed here need to be idempotent and independent of the actual upgrade jump (what was the previous version). They should complete in a reasonable time, not more than a few minutes maximum.
NsApiSlow threshold: 5000 ms.

SuperOffice.WebApi.v1.Carriers.Diagnosti.description: FlushCachesByName: Flushes all NetServer caches named
GetCacheState: Get the current generation value of the named caches. State is opaque.
GetCacheInvalidationGenerations: Get generation for provided names

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.CacheInvalidati.description:
Carrier object for CacheInvalidation.
Services for the CacheInvalidation Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IDiagnosticsAgent">Diagnostics Agent</see>.

Name.description: The (unique!) name of the cache, which is often, but not always, the same as a physical table name

Generation.description: The 'generation number', starts at 1 and goes up for every registered change

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.EntityCounts.description:
Carrier object for EntityCounts.
Services for the EntityCounts Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IDiagnosticsAgent">Diagnostics Agent</see>.

EntityName.description: The entity measured by this tile

Records.description: Number of entities (EntityName) an associate has created

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.CRM.Security.TableRight.description:
Wraps a table right together with an explanatory reason.
Code can indicate why access is restricted.

SuperOffice.CRM.Security.FieldProperty.description: Class holding properties like field length, field type about a field in the carrier.

SuperOffice.CRM.Security.FieldRight.description:
Wraps the field right together with an explanatory reason.
Also adds logical operators to the field rights so that they can be easily combined.

SuperOffice.WebApi.v1.Carriers.Diagnosti.description: LogViewState: Log a change in view state. The granularity of the logging depends on the current configuration. This call returns asynchronously, leaving the server to finish processing later on.
SendSystemMessage: Adds a system message for a specific associate.
RemoveSystemMessage: Removes a system message for current associate
RemoveSystemMessageForAssociate: Removes a system message for specific associate.
GetSystemMessages: Retrieves a list of system messages for a specific associate.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.SystemMessage.description:
System Message to be displayed to a user
<para />
Carrier object for SystemMessage.
Services for the SystemMessage Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IDiagnosticsAgent">Diagnostics Agent</see>.

AssociateId.description: The associate that is the target of this message

OnlineappId.description: The online app that owns this message

SystemMessageId.description: Message identifier, used for message update or removal

MarkdownMessage.description: Markdown message to be displayed to user

Expire.description: The date and time the message expires  in UTC.

Type.description: Type of message, example: info, warning, error

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.WebApi.v1.Carriers.Diagnosti.description: PerformTasksAfterCustomObjectTableCreated: A temporary method to be used from c++ until CustomObjectsAgent.CreateTable implemented in NetServer
PerformTasksAfterCustomObjectTableDeleted: A temporary method to be used from c++ until CustomObjectsAgent.DeleteTable implemented in NetServer
AddWebAppUsage: Adds WebApp usage to existing log

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.WebAppUsage.description:
Carrier object for WebAppUsage.
Services for the WebAppUsage Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IDiagnosticsAgent">Diagnostics Agent</see>.

Timestamp.description: Which day the usage was logged

AggregateCount.description: Number of times the specific soprotocol is accessed

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.WebApi.v1.Carriers.Diagnosti.description: WebAppUsageExistsInPeriod: Returns true if viewState has been clicked at least once since FromDate, if asscoiateId < 0 or FromDate is DateTime.MinValue no restriction given for those parameters
GetWebAppUsagesForPeriod: Get all WebAppUsages for a given period, that match an optional search term

SuperOffice Password.description:
SuperOffice username:password are passed in Base64-encoded. 

You can also pass inn an unencoded ticket 7T:abc== with the HTTP Authenticate header.

SuperId Authentication.description:
SuperOffice SuperId OAuth implicit flow. 
You need to issue a request to the SuperId authorization URL
    https://online.superoffice.com/login/common/oauth/authorize?response_type=token
      &client_id=670734e0-4c5a-11e3-be9e-a171392e81db
      &redirect_uri=https://example.com/spa/

passing in the application id and redirect URL.

SuperId will log the user in, and redirect to the requested redirect URL with a #payload
containing the access token and claims. (The redirect URL must be registered with SuperId in advance)

   https://example.com/spa#access_token=8A%3aCust12227.AXRrCITpPBvQX3UbIohb
      &token_type=bearer
      &state=
      &expires_in=3600
      &ctx=Cust12227
      &netserver_url=https%3a%2f%2fsod.superoffice.com%2fCust12227%2fRemote%2fServices82%2f

You can take the #access_token value and pass it as the Authenticate HTTP header as a BEARER token.

externalDocs.description: The SuperOffice DevNet Community has more documentation, examples, and discussion forums.
